duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a primary point of contact for client technical inquiries and issues.
Provide advanced technical support via phone, email, and ticketing system.
Diagnose and resolve complex hardware, software, and network problems.
Collaborate with team members to escalate and resolve challenging issues.
Actively contribute to the development and maintenance of the MSP knowledge base.
Assist in training and mentoring junior support analysts.
Ensure timely resolution and follow-up on client-reported problems.
Participate in after-hours support rotation as needed.
Continuously update and document client configurations and solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (preferred)
